parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: AutoCompose
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable automatic merging. Valid values:

*   **ON**: enables automatic merging. If you set this parameter to ON, you must also specify the ComposeVodTranscodeGroupId parameter.
*   **OFF**: disables automatic merging.

>  If you enable automatic merging, the VOD files created from live streams are automatically merged. During the process, the editing and production feature of ApsaraVideo VOD is used. For information about the billing of this feature, see [Billing of editing and production](~~188310~~).

parameters.name: ComposeVodTranscodeGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the transcoding template group in ApsaraVideo VOD that is used to transcode the video file, into which the VOD files are automatically merged.

> 
*   This parameter is required only if you set the AutoCompose parameter to ON.
*   For more information about automatic merging and transcoding, see [FAQ about Live-to-VOD](~~99726~~).
*   For more information about the billing of transcoding in ApsaraVideo VOD, see [Billing of media transcoding](~~188308~~).

parameters.name: CycleDuration
parameters.description: The duration of the recording period. Unit: seconds. Valid values: **300 to 21600**. Default value: **3600**.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream.

parameters.name: VodTranscodeGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the transcoding template group in ApsaraVideo VOD.
